channel.title: Start command if player use an item on another item
channel.description:
hi :D i have trying to learn java on my own... but i couldnt understand something now i've looked on the codes and learn the some basic :D but i've one big problem :|
1.how do i start the code if a player use water on floor and u will get bread dough?
2. if u use the bread dough on a range then u will get a bread? all in all i need the basic of coding when u use something on another thing
edit: thats in a 317 if that change something ;)

item.description:
@system wrote:

  1. i totally forgot to look at the cooking skill srry

  2. is that really impossible to make a normal cooking skill?

Read full topic
